attributes.action: Reverse the decision to postpone local elections
attributes.additional_details: We have a democratic right to vote for who represents us, the British people, and postponing that violates the constitution. Regardless of any ongoing plans to reform the local councils, we as the people need to be able to chose who best represents our interests.
attributes.background: Reverse the decision to postpone local elections in East Sussex, West Sussex, Essex, Thurrock, Hampshire, The Isle of Wight, Norfolk, Suffolk, and Surrey.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action: 

Do not postpone the local elections
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710155
